info.name: Userstyles.org - another update of Super Style
info.description: This is a modification of style 44215 (which in turn was a modification of style 19082). I have not done much, although I have added a few tweaks. These include a slightly different background (using CSS3 gradients), a semitransparent search section and visible "Contact the admin." link. I have also fixed the issues with the like buttons having the same background as the page.
info.additionalInfo:
Background repeating-linear-gradient has been given both -webkit- and -moz- prefixes. 

If you are using Stylebot, use its install link, then go to edit the style in Edit CSS mode. Scroll to the top and put -webkit- before repeating-linear-gradient. This comes about because Stylebot only takes the last value for each attribute. This is OK most of the time, because it makes the style more efficient, but when using vendor-specific properties it can cause problems. Here, I specified the generic repeating-linear-gradient last, in the hope that it was going to be the property selected once the style has been executed on a browser that supports the generic property.

Webkit sometimes renders the background poorly when the page is resized. If you want to avoid this, changing 150deg to 135deg may help.
